Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    NotifiableHandler  
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ClientHandler
    This class represents the handler of the local game mode.
    Controller
    This class reads as input what arrives from the client and calls the different managers to perform the actions on the model, it can also return messages to be sent to the clients to the various client handlers.
    Parser  
    Server  
    ServerPing
    Every 5 seconds they send a keep alive ping message, which takes advantage of the fact that client-side and server-side sockets after 15 seconds without receiving, throw an exception
